sServerTab0: Zombie's are stronger than usual and can break into doors.
You are going to have to play tactically unless running with a large squad.
There are 3 kinds of radioactive bears that can not be taken down by one person.
Large packs of wolves with hell hounds and ghost wolves roam these lands.
No PvP is allowed. Magic bullet will inflect damage on the shooter if PvP happens.
sServerTab1: The syberia mod brings a whole new level of health issues to DayZ.
You will need to know what kind of medicines cure each issue you encounter.
Check the Discord for all the details you will need to survive.
Each character has 5 souls. Every time you die it costs 1 sould to respawn.
After you have used all 5 souls you will have to start a new character and will lose your skill progression.
This is meant to be hard care so take your time, play safe, stay healthy.
sServerTab2: We only have a few rules when it comes to base building.
Don't block off loot spawns or military zones. That's it.
Make sure you have a flag or else your loot will despawn.
There is no base raiding on this server.
That means no sneaking in or jumping walls.
Unsecurred bases are fair game to loot.
